String.Source: Tax Rate determines how much money your citizens must pay in taxes for each of their respective plots.
String.Dest: 税率决定你的公民必须为他们各自使用的各种土地支付多少税收。

String.Source: Citizens will now be charged the normal calculated tax rate for Agricultural Plots.
String.Dest: 市民的农业地块现在将收取正常税金。

String.Source: Citizens will now be charged half the calculated tax rate for Agricultural Plots.
String.Dest: 市民的农业地块现在将收取一半的税金。

String.Source: Citizens will no longer be charged taxes for Agricultural Plots.
String.Dest: 市民的农业地块现在将免除税金。

String.Source: Citizens will now be charged double the calculated tax rate for Agricultural Plots.
String.Dest: 市民的农业地块现在将被收取两倍的税收。

String.Source: The Tax Cycle determines how often your citizens must pay taxes.
String.Dest: 税收周期决定了你的居民每隔多久缴税一次。

String.Source: Citizens will now be required to pay taxes daily.
String.Dest: 现在公民将被要求每天纳税。

String.Source: Citizens will now be required to pay taxes every 2 days.
String.Dest: 现在要求公民每2天纳税一次。

String.Source: Citizens will now be required to pay taxes every 3 days.
String.Dest: 现在要求公民每3天纳税一次。

String.Source: Citizens will now be required to pay taxes every 5 days.
String.Dest: 现在要求公民每5天纳税一次。

String.Source: Citizens will now be required to pay taxes weekly.
String.Dest: 现在要求公民每周缴纳税款。

String.Source: Citizens will now be required to pay taxes every other week.
String.Dest: 现在将要求公民每隔一周纳税一次。

String.Source: Citizens will now be required to pay taxes monthly.
String.Dest: 现在要求公民每月缴纳税款。

String.Source:
I can't believe I finally fixed one! Suck it, Steve!
This is so exciting! I can store my notes, view all those holotapes I found, I can even start learning to hack! Those Vault computers are as good as mine!
Ok, ok, time to focus and study up! Let's start with this tape - PipFall.
String.Dest:
我不敢相信我终于修好了！操！，史提夫！
这是如此令人兴奋！我可以储存我的笔记，看那些全像卡带我发现，我甚至可以开始学习黑客！那些金库计算机和我的一样好！
好的，时间集中和研究起来！让我们用这盘磁带开始：PipFall。

String.Source:
Video games are incredible! I feel like I discovered the cure to Rad sickness... they help me relieve stress, they keep my mind firing, and most importantly they let me escape this hell we call life!
It makes me wonder how the world even ended, they should have just given games to everyone and there would have been nothing to fight over...
I've got to find more! I'll put the word out with Carla, she can bring me tapes - maybe even old terminals, somebody has to have left a game or two inside of one!
String.Dest:
电子游戏令人难以置信！我觉得我发现了治愈RAD病的方法…他们帮助我减轻压力，他们让我的思想燃烧，最重要的是他们让我逃离这地狱！我们称之为生活！
它让我想知道世界是如何结束的，他们应该给每个人游戏，然后就没有什么不可以战胜…
我必须找到更多！我会把这个告诉卡拉，她可以给我带来磁带-也许甚至老终端机，有人已经会在里面存着一两个游戏！

String.Source: CK Error. Entry corrupted. Contact your Robco service tech.
String.Dest: 校验值错误。程序入口损坏。请与Robco公司技术支持取得联系。

String.Source: Place was infested with radroaches and mole rats, wish I'd have brought that stick she gave me - ERROR MISSING DATA - ssor Widget thing into the - ERROR MISSING DATA -
String.Dest: 这里到处都是辐射蟑螂和变异鼹鼠，真希望我带了她给的那个棒子 -错误：数据丢失- 把零件放进 - 错误：数据丢失 -

String.Source: Steel bastards confiscated original. See archives backup tape.
String.Dest: 那个混蛋没收了原件。请查看备份磁带。

String.Source:
I think I found a way where I can play all the games at once!
I just need more screens!
String.Dest:
我想我找到了一个可以同时玩所有游戏的方法！
我只需要更多的屏幕！

String.Source: Patient has chest pain if she lies on her left side for over a year.
String.Dest: 如果病人躺在她的左侧超过一年，她会胸痛。

String.Source: Rectal examination revealed a normal sized thyroid.
String.Dest: 直肠检查显示甲状腺大小正常。
偶然的，持续的，罕见的头痛。

String.Source: The patient has no previous history of suicides.

String.Dest: 与巫术有关的急性疼痛。

String.Source: She is numbed from her toes down.
String.Dest: 她从她的脚趾开始麻木。

String.Source: She stated that she had been constipated for most of her life, until she found Atom.
String.Dest: 她说她已经便秘了她大半辈子，直到她发现原子。
与害羞有关的大便失禁。

String.Source: Discharge status: Alive but without permission.
String.Dest: 放电状态：活着但未经许可。

String.Source: Advised patient to take a bath.
Both breasts are equal and reactive to light and touch.
String.Dest: 两个乳房都是一样的，无论对光和触摸的反应。

String.Source: The patient�s feces are the same color as the door on my house.
String.Dest: 病人的粪便和我家门口的颜色一样。

String.Source: The patient has done well without oxygen for the past year.
String.Dest: 病人过去一年没有氧气做得很好。

String.Source: All visible brain tissue had been removed. The patient has no neurological complaints after surgery.
String.Dest: 所有可见的脑组织已被移除。患者术后无神经系统主诉。

String.Source:
In version 1.1.0, the default plots were switched to a standard 2x2 tile size. If you prefered the smaller size, turning this option on restores the original plots to be buildable as well.
Note that new buildings added by Sim Settlements and AddOns may go over the boundaries of the original plot size, so it's recommended that you leave some space around them.
String.Dest:
从1.1.0版本开始，默认的地块被切换到一个标准的2x2的平铺尺寸。如果你喜欢尺寸较小，打开此选项恢复原来的地块大小。
请注意，新的建筑物可能超出原地块大小的界限，所以建议你留下一些他们周围的空间。
使用旧版地块大小：开启

String.Source:
In version 1.1.0, the default plots were switched to a standard 2x2 tile size. If you prefered the smaller size, turning this option on restores the original plots to be buildable as well.
Note that new buildings added by Sim Settlements and AddOns may go over the boundaries of the original plot size, so it's recommended that you leave some space around them.
String.Dest:
从1.1.0版本开始，默认的地块被切换到一个标准的2x2的平铺尺寸。如果你喜欢尺寸较小，打开此选项恢复原来的地块大小。
请注意，新的建筑物可能超出原地块大小的界限，所以建议你留下一些他们周围的空间。
错误的传感器，毁灭一切！

String.Source:
To Whom it May Concern,
We received the new version of your program, but you sent us the Pipboy edition! And all these doohickies you sent us are last year's model! There are hundreds of them, what are we going to do with all of these?
We expect you to send a courier to pick these up, as well as deliver the correct program, the newer model ones we ordered - AND we want all the optional features thrown in for our trouble - including the taser!
Sincerely,
Jane Williams Office of the Mayor Concord, MA
String.Dest:
任何可能会关注人：
我们收到了你的程序的新版本，但你给我们的是pipboy版！所有这些你寄给我们的狗屎是去年的模型！有成百上千的个！我们要怎么处理这些？
我们希望你派个快递员把这些拿走，以及顺便提供正确的程序，新的模型！-包括我们希望所有的可选功能，能解决我们的麻烦！包括泰瑟枪！
真诚的， 简·威廉姆斯 市长办公室 康科德，马萨诸塞

String.Source:
Oh thank god! I don't think I can take many more colonial flute and drums!
-Marge
=================================== From: Jane, Williams Subject: Renovations ===================================
I just heard from upstairs that the renovations are almost done, only a month or so more. We'll probably be back to City Hall before Thanksgiving!
-Jane
String.Dest:
哦感谢上帝！我不认为我可以拿更多的殖民长笛和鼓！
-玛姬 =================================== 来自：简，威廉姆斯 主题：装修 ===================================
我刚从楼上听说装修差不多就完成了，只剩下一个月左右了。感恩节前我们可能会回到市政厅！
-简

String.Source:
City Manager 2078 - Main Menu
Welcome, Mr. Mayor!
Use the sub-sections below to govern your city, and control how City Manager 2078 notifies you of things that happen there!
String.Dest:
城市管家2078 -主菜单
欢迎，市长先生！
使用下面的部分来管理你的城市，并控制城市管家2078如何通知你发生的事情！

String.Source:
As usual we provide the schematics to last year's model of our award winning Advanced Survey and Activity Monitoring (ASAM) Sensor.
This sensor does amazing things to help you run a successful city!
- Uses laser survey technology to display boundaries so you and your citizens know exactly where they can build!
- Sync's with City Manager 2078 to keep you up to date on everything happening in your city!
- Provides a simple push button interface for your citizens to request building permits!
- Notifies citizen of taxes and fees due with a simple-to-read neon display!
New features with the 2078 edition:
- Utility usage monitoring synched directly to City Manger 2078, find out who the wasters are and bill them more!
- One-way audio communication, now you can shout directly at a citizen from the comfort of your desk or Pipboy without the pesky talking back you'd get from a telephone!
- Optional taser attachment to give a disruptive citizen a jolt!
String.Dest:
像往常一样，我们提供了来自我们屡获殊荣的：先进的测量和活动监控传感器（ASAM Sensor）的最新图纸（去年版）。
这个传感器能完成惊人的工作，以帮助您运行一个成功的城市！
使用激光测量技术来显示边界，这样你和你的公民就知道他们可以在哪里建造！
与城市管家2078同步，让你随时了解在你的城市最新发生的一切！
-提供一个简单的按钮界面为您的公民申领建设许可证！
-通知公民交纳税费，由一个简单的阅读霓虹灯来提示！
新功能与2078版：
工具使用监控传感器直接同步数据到城市管家2078、找出谁是浪费的家伙，收他们更多的税！
一路音频通信，现在你可以直接从你的办公桌或pipboy向你的任意居民发号施令！不在会有讨厌的电话杂音和电话线！
附件有泰瑟枪，用于给你的居民以最大震慑！
提供额外的实用工具:开启

String.Source: Provide Extra Utilities disabled. Utilities will now be capped so citizens cannot reqest extra usage for things like electricity and water. Also, VIP citizens will no longer provide extra benefits to the city.
String.Dest: 提供额外的工具禁用。事业现在将封顶，公民不能要求额外的使用，像水和电。此外，VIP市民将不再提供额外的福利城市。
提供额外的实用工具:关闭

String.Source: Provide Extra Utilities enabled (default). Citizens may now request extra utility usage such as electricity or water. VIP citizens will sometimes provide extra benefits to the city.
String.Dest: 提供额外的实用功能（默认）。市民现在可能要求额外的实用用途，如电力或水。VIP市民有时会给城市额外的福利。

String.Source: Initial Plot Costs disabled. You can now designate plots with virtually no up front cost to you, your citizens will need to come up with more materials to handle utility connections themselves.
String.Dest: 初始地块成本禁用。您现在可以指定地块几乎没有前期成本给你，你的公民将需要拿出更多的材料来处理实用连接自己。

String.Source: Initial Plot Costs enabled (default setting). Plots will now have a cost to designate, this helps citizens get building quicker as you've set up all the utility connections they'll need for them - expect that tax income any day now!
String.Dest: 初始地块成本启用（默认设置）。地块现在将有一个指定的成本，这有助于公民得到更快的建设，因为你已经建立了他们所需要的所有公用事业连接-期望税收收入的任何一天现在！

String.Source: Regular Inspections disabled (default). Buildings will no longer be delayed for regular scanning inspections by the ASAM Sensor. Citizens will be free to build as fast as they can.
String.Dest: 定期检查禁用（默认）。建筑将不再推迟定期扫描检查的ASAM传感器。市民可以自由地建造尽可能快。

String.Source: Regular Inspections enabled. Buildings will now be scanned at every stage by the Plot ASAM Sensor to ensure they are up to code. This will dramatically slow down Citizen build times.
String.Dest: 定期检查启用。建筑物现在将扫描每一阶段的ASAM传感器以确保他们达到代码。这将大大减慢公民建立时间。

String.Source: Auto Assignment disabled. Citizens will no longer be granted access to Plots automatically, they'll wait for you to tell them where they are allowed to build.
String.Dest: 自动分配禁用。市民将不再获得自动访问的阴谋，他们会等你告诉他们在那里被允许建立。

String.Source: Auto Assignment enabled (default). City Manager 2078 will now process all building requests from your citizens and assign them to appropriate plots.
String.Dest: 启用自动分配（默认）。城市管家2078现在将处理所有建设请求从您的公民，并将其分配到适当的地块。

String.Source: Job Requirement disabled. Residents will no longer be required to prove they have employment in a designated Agricultural, Commercial, or Industrial zone in order to receive permits for home improvements.
String.Dest: 工作要求禁用。居民将不再需要证明他们有就业在指定的农业，商业或工业区，以获得家庭改善许可证。

String.Source: Job Requiement enabled (default). Residents will now be required to prove they have employment in a designated Agricultural, Commercial, or Industrial zone in order to receive permits for home improvements.
String.Dest: 工作要求启用（默认）。居民现在必须证明他们在指定的农业，商业或工业区的就业，以获得家庭改善许可证。

String.Source: Personal Inspection disabled. City Manager 2078 will now grant permits for building improvements, even without you having to visit the city to inspect the current building.
String.Dest: 个人检查禁用。城市管家2078现在将允许建筑改进的许可证，即使没有你必须访问城市检查目前的建筑物。

String.Source: Personal Inspection enabled (default). City Manager 2078 will deny permits for building improvements until you've personally inspected the current building by visitng your city.
String.Dest: 启用个人检查（默认）。城市管家2078会否认建筑的改进允许直到你亲自考察了当前建筑的去你的城市。

String.Source:
Hi, you must be the new Mayor!
Welcome to the exciting world of city management. Choose a topic below to learn more about using City Manager 2078.
String.Dest:
嗨，你一定是新市长！
欢迎来到城市管家的精彩世界。选择下面的主题，了解更多关于使用城市管家2078。

String.Source:
The most important part of founding a new city is setting up zones, you wouldn't want a dirty peasant factory opening up next to your favorite restaurant, would you?
There are four types of zones you can designate:
1) Residential: You need somewhere for people to build homes and live, these people pay taxes so you can stay wealthy!
2) Agricultural: This land is reserved for farming and ranching. It's important to be self-sufficient in case of a global catastrophe!
3) Industrial: Factories and mines ensure there will be tiring jobs to keep your citizens too exhausted to ever revolt against your decisions!
4) Commercial: These areas will be designated for stores, restaurants, hospitals, and most importantly - bars! Don't be disappointed if aspiring merchants don't rush to your city right away. Just keep Mayoring away and as word of your great city spreads and your population grows, they'll come running to start offering goods to your citizens - and you can take a healthy cut of the profits!
String.Dest:
建立一个新城市最重要的部分是规划好区域，你不希望一个肮脏的农民工厂在你最喜欢的餐馆旁边开，是吗？
有四种类型的区域你可以指定：
1）住宅：你需要人们建立家园和生活，这些人纳税，使你可以保持富裕！
2）农业：这片土地是用于农业和牧场。在全球灾难中自给自足是很重要的！
3）工业：工厂和矿山确保将有累人的工作，不让你的公民太疲惫，否则他们会永远反对你的决定！
4）商业：这些区域将被指定为商店，餐馆，医院，最重要的酒吧！不要失望，如果有抱负的商人不急于马上在你的城市出现。只要保持市长不要来城里乱搞，保持你伟大的城市蔓延和人口增长的话，他们会跑来开始提供商品给你的公民，你可以获得一个健康的税收削减！

String.Source:
Zoning Laws can be configured in the Zoning Laws section of this software. They help determine how your finances are handled. You can choose to invest up front and help encourage growth, or make your citizens pay for things so you can keep your hard-earned cash.
To understand Zoning Laws, you must first understand what a Plot is. No, not those lower class plans to overthrow you, a plot of land!
A Plot is a small piece of land designated as a specific zone. Each plot can be owned and built on by one of your citizens. As long as you provide them utility services and keep them safe, they'll pay you taxes for your trouble!
Auto Assignment - If set to On, City Manager 2078 will process all requests through the ASAM sensors for building permits. You'll never have to talk to another person again!
If set to Off, each citizen will be told to wait patiently while the busy, and important, Mayor decides where they can build.
Auto Assignment also includes additional sub-options to help you get fine tune control of how assignment is handled. Each of these options will start with Auto Assign.
Commercial Requirement - Generally, entrepreneurs want to see a well established city and a good number of residential homes before they open up new commercial businesses in the area.
If you change this setting to Population, City Manager will alter records to include all citizens in the population count instead of just the verified home owners. Don't worry, it's not illegal! (Robco does not guarantee or maintain resposibility for any legal damages imposed due to altering legal records).
Dynamic Needs - Your citizens expect you to provide basic services, such as water, electricity, and maintain a security force to keep them safe.
If this setting is On, as your citizens build up your city they will start to expect more elaborate services, but they'll pay more taxes in return. If instead, you'd prefer to leave them to fend for themselves like the mangey dogs they are, you can turn this Off - though don't expect much on tax day!
Hold Upgrades Until I See Them - Citizens will be denied approval for renovations until you have had a chance to personally inspect their work. City Manager will take note of your location and automatically approve pending renovation requests after you arrive in your city!
Initial Plot Costs - If set to On, you'll provide a small amount of materials to set up the basic needs of that plot, such as the foundation and connections to utilities so your citizens can begin building right away, and thus start paying taxes sooner!
On the other hand, if you don't want to make the investment, you can change this to Off and your citizens will have to set up the all that stuff by themselves. A little hard work won't kill them, and they'll still pay taxes eventually.
Jobs Required - If set to On, citizens will only be granted home improvement permits if they can prove they have employment at another ASAM monitored Plot.
If set to Off, even shifty citizens who can't prove their societal value will be allowed to modify their homes.
Realistic Build Times - If set to On, the ASAM sensor will constantly monitor the building for code violations and ensure the citizen does everything perfectly! Construction will become a long and rewarding process for them, where they get to learn the ins and outs of regulations. Failure to do so will result in ear-piercing sirens notifing all of the other citizens what a cheater their neighbor is.
If set to Off, the citizen is free to build as fast as they can - though don't blame us if they cut corners!
String.Dest:
地区法律可以在本软件的地区法律部分进行配置。他们决定了您的财务将被如何处理。你可以选择在前面投资，帮助鼓励经济增长，或者让你的公民为各种服务付费，这样你就可以保住辛苦赚来的钱。
要了解地区法律，你必须首先了解什么是地块。地块就是一块土地！
地块是指定为特定区域的小块土地。每个地块可以由你的公民拥有和在上面进行建造。只要你提供他们的公共事业服务，并确保他们的安全，他们会支付给你税金！
自动分配 - 如果设置，城市管家2078将通过ASAM传感器处理所有的各类请求。你再也不用和别人说话了！
如果关闭，每个公民都会被告知耐心等待，等待繁忙的市长大人决定在哪里可以建立。
自动分配还包括额外的子选项，以帮助您获得微调控制如何分配处理。每个选项将从自动分配开始。
商业前置 - 一般来说，企业家希望看到一个聚落拥有完善的城市设施和大量的住宅，然后再开辟新的商业企业在该地区。
如果你改变这个设置为 人口，城市管家将改为用公民的人口计数，而不是只是验证房主。别担心，这是合法的！（Robco公司并不保证或承诺的任何法律赔偿责任以及由于法律改变造成的犯罪记录）。
动态需求 - 你的公民期望你提供基本的服务，如水，电，并保持防御，以确保他们的安全。
如果这个设置开始，当你的公民建立你的城市，他们将开始期待更增值的服务，同时他们将支付更多的税收作为回报。如果相反，你宁愿让他们自生自灭像野狗一样，你也可以关闭-但不要指望收多少税了！
直到我看到才升级 - 居民将被拒绝装修的批准，直到你有机会亲自检查他们的工作。城市管家将注意到您的位置，在您到达您的城市后自动批准待装修请求！
初始地块成本 - 如果设置为开启，你会需要消耗少量的材料以建立基本的地块，如地基和连接到公共服务，使您的公民可以立即开始建设，从而开始纳税！
另一方面，如果你不想投资，你可以改变这一点，你的公民将不得不建立所有的东西自己。一点点努力不会杀死他们，他们最终还是要交税的。
工作要求 - 如果设置为开启，居民仅在有工作以后才能升级自己的房屋。
如果设置为关闭，甚至穷鬼没有收入的人也能升级房屋。
真实建造时间 - 如果设置，ASAM传感器会不断监控违章建筑和保障建筑的一切完美！建设将成为一个漫长而有益的过程，他们在那里学习建筑工程的来龙去脉和规例。不这样做将导致刺耳的警报通知所有其他公民的邻居是什么骗子。
如果设置为关闭，居民可以尽可能快的建造房屋-不要责怪我们，如果他们偷工减料！

String.Source:
As the smartest, and most important person in the city, it's up to you to provide basic services to the people. They need water, food, and they need to feel secure, and if you're feeling like a generous god, you can even provide them with electricity.
Water: Building wells and water plants will ensure your citizens can work longer hours toward making your city great!
Food: No, you don't have to feed them yourself - they may SEEM like children, but they can grow their own food. Just be sure to designate some plots for agriculture. Or, if you'd like to show them what a strong, capable, hands-on leader you are, you can plant some crops and trees yourself to show them how it's done - they'll take over from there - that or they'll starve to death!
Security: As your city becomes more prosperous, it will become more of a target to criminals. While your citizens will bare all the physical harm caused by these miscreants - if you let thieves get away with it, they'll be no taxes left for you to collect! So protect your source of income, invest in security measures!
Electricity: While those working class people can live without it, giving them access to this fine luxury will make them more willing to invest in the plots you bestow to them, and the better off they are, the more taxes you can collect!
String.Dest:
作为城市里最聪明、最重要的人，你要向人民提供基本的服务。他们需要水，食物，他们需要感到安全，如果你感觉像一个慷慨的上帝，你甚至可以提供他们的电力。
水：建设水井和水厂将确保您的市民可以工作更长的时间，使你的城市伟大！
食物：不，你不必自己喂他们-他们看起来像孩子，但他们可以自己种植食物。一定要指定一些农业用地。或者，如果你想告诉他们你是一个多么强壮，有能力，有实际行动的领导者，你可以自己种一些庄稼和树来告诉他们它是怎么做的--他们会从那里接管--或者他们会饿死！
安全：随着你的城市变得更加繁荣，它将成为犯罪分子的目标。当您的市民裸露在外的财产，会被歹徒和小偷偷走，他们会没有税收！所以保护你的收入来源，投资于安全措施！
电力：虽然那些工薪阶层的人可以没有它的生活，让他们获得这种美好的奢侈品，将使他们更愿意投资于你给他们的阴谋，更好的是，更多的税收，你可以收集！

String.Source:
You've discovered one of the great features of City Manger 2078! Your citizens will be granted the use of plots through the magical power of Computer Automation!
All you have to do is use our augmented reality Pipboy interface and patented RobCo ASAM Sensors to start designating plots of land as different zones - then City Manger 2078 will handle all the permits and deeds! After all - you're far too busy and important for something as mundane as talking to a working class citizen to tell them where they can build.
Once you've zoned a bit of your city, the needs of your citizens will be continously synched with your Pipboy to help you determine where to invest in infrastructure, security services, and further zoning.
City Manager 2078 won't get in your way though, as the Mayor, you're free to override any decisions the software makes. You can give preferential treatment to all your friends and loved ones!
String.Dest:
你已经发现了一个伟大的特点，城市管家2078！通过计算机自动化的神奇力量，你的公民将被授予使用地块的权利！
所有你必须做的是用我们的增强现实pipboy接口和专利的RobCo ASAM传感器开始指定地块到不同区域。城市管家2078会处理所有的许可证和事迹！毕竟，对于那些和工薪阶层的公民交谈，告诉他们在哪里可以建立的东西来说，你实在太忙碌了，太重要了。
一旦你开始规划你的城市，你的市民的需求将不断同步到你的pipboy并帮助你决定在哪里投资在基础设施、安全服务，进一步分区。
城市管家2078不会帮你的倒忙式，但作为市长，你可以自由压倒任何管家的决定。你可以给你所有的朋友和亲人的优惠待遇！

String.Source:
With the power of City Manager 2078 and RobCo Advanced Survey and Activity Monitoring (ASAM) Sensors- finances are a breeze!
City Manager will automatically monitor for changes in the net worth of your citizens through the power of laser scanning and modify their tax rates on the fly!
It will even notify them on tax day of the amount they owe, accompanied by an appropriately unending, loud-pitched sound that continues day and night until the taxes are paid. Your citizens will surely thank you for the reminder, no one likes to miss a payment to the government!
Both the tax rates and the tax cycle can be configured right from your Pipboy!
String.Dest:
拥有城市管家2078、该先进的ASAM传感器，财政事物就像呼吸一样简单！
城市经理将自动监测您的市民的净资产的变化，通过激光扫描瞬间修改他们的税率！
它甚至会在他们在他们所欠税款的日子，播放一个适当的无休止的，响亮的声音，日夜持续，直到税款支付。您的市民一定会感谢您的提醒，没有人喜欢错过支付给政府！
税率和税收周期可以从你的pipboy配置！

String.Source:
City Manager 2078 will detect when you are in your city bounds and add to your Pipboy Heads-up Display to show you what your city needs to get squeeze maximum tax value out of your citizens!
The HUD Meters are broken into three sections.
1) Basic needs: At the top are your citizen's basic need - food, water, and a sense of safety. Keep these meters full to ensure your citizens not only pay taxes, but eventually upgrade their properties so they have to pay even more!
2) Plot data: Next is information about your ASAM Sensor defined Plots. The first meter shows the number of plots in your city with enough electricity, the second shows the ratio of Residential Plots versus the number of citizen's requesting homes, and the third meter shows the ratio of non-Residential Plots versus the number of citizen's requesting jobs.
Keeping these meters full will ensure you're taking full advantage of the population that wants to live in your city!
3) Happiness: Using our patented advanced laser scanning (now with minimal retinal damage!), ASAM sensors can judge the overall happiness of your citizens. Citizens are happiest when they have all of their needs met, including a home, a job, and plenty to eat and drink. Remember: a happy citizen is a productive citizen!
String.Dest:
城市管家2078会在你进入你的城市边界后添加到您的pipboy HUD 来显示你的城市需求！
HUD米被分成三个部分。
1）基本需要：在顶部是您的公民的基本需要-食物，水，和安全感。保持这些满，以确保您的公民不仅纳税，但最终升级他们的财产，所以他们必须支付更多！
2）绘图数据：接下来是关于你的阿萨姆传感器定义地块信息。第一米显示的数字在你的城市有足够的电力，第二个显示的比例住宅小区与公民的请求家园的数量，和第三米显示的比例非住宅地块与人数的公民的要求工作。 保持这些米充分将确保你充分利用的人口想住在你的城市！
3）快乐：使用我们的专利先进的激光扫描（现在与最小的视网膜损伤！）该传感器可以判断，你的市民整体幸福感。公民在满足他们所有的需要时都是最幸福的，包括一个家庭，一份工作，以及大量的吃喝。记住：快乐的公民是富有成效的公民！

String.Source:
This section has some tips to help you be the best Mayor you can be!
City Needs - Watch your city's needs, if your citizens don't have enough food and water, don't feel secure, or are generally unhappy - they will be less likely to re-invest in your city. For example, if they are having problems with food, designate more Agricultural plots to encourage them to build more farms, if crime becomes an issue, increase their feeling of safety and invest more heavily in security. Remember, a happy citizen is a productive citizen!
VIPs - Keep an eye out for VIPs moving into your city. These people will tend to use more city resources, but if you make them happy, they'll invest in your city and eventually provide much more than they're taking. As Mayor you have the legal right to go through anyone's home*, and with VIPs we recommend it highly, it's fascinating to see what they're up to, especially after they improve their homes.
* RobCo takes no responsibilty for the consequences of home invasion.
Moving Plots - Don't like where you originally set up a Plot? Feel free to move it, just know that you'll have to knock down anything your citizens built there. Don't worry though, they can just rebuild in the new location! Don't like WHAT they built, demand that they build something different - they'll be happy to oblige - what's a few more days/weeks/months of hard labor and raw material costs. People love government and are excited to help it in anyway they can, especially if it makes someone important like the Mayor happy!
Monitoring Resource Usage - Be sure to keep track of how many city resources are being used by your citizens at each plot. If you invested in the 2078 edition of the RobCo ASAM Sensors, this information will be automatically collected for you. If you decided instead to be thrifty and kept using our perfectly good 2077 edition, you can always record the usage by hand - heck carve it right onto the building - this is your city!
String.Dest:
本节有一些技巧可以帮助你成为最好的市长！
城市需要-看你的城市的需要，如果你的公民没有足够的食物和水，不感到安全，或一般不快乐-他们将不太可能重新投资在你的城市。例如，如果他们对食物有问题，指定更多的农业地块来鼓励他们建造更多的农场，如果犯罪成为一个问题，增加他们的安全感，并在安全上投入更多的资金。记住，幸福的公民是富有成效的公民！
关注你的贵宾进入你的城市。这些人倾向于使用更多的城市资源，但如果你让他们快乐，他们会投资于你的城市，并最终提供比他们采取更多。作为市长，你有合法的权利通过任何人的家*，并与贵宾我们高度推荐，它是迷人的，看看他们是什么，尤其是在他们改善自己的家园。 * RobCo概不负责家庭入侵的后果。
移动剧情-不喜欢你最初设置的情节？随时移动它，只知道你将不得不打倒任何你的公民建有。别担心，他们可以重建新的位置！不喜欢他们建造的东西，要求他们建造一些不同的东西，他们会很乐意接受-什么是几天/几周/几个月的艰苦劳动和原材料成本。人们热爱政府，并且乐于帮助他们，尤其是当它让某些重要的人喜欢市长时！
监测资源的使用-请务必跟踪多少城市资源正在使用您的公民在每个阴谋。如果你投资在该该传感器的2078版，该信息将自动为你收集。如果你决定节俭，并继续使用我们完美的2077版，你可以随时记录使用的手-地狱雕刻它的权利，这是你的城市！

String.Source:
The City Manager software, combined with ASAM Sensor technology, and the power of your Pipboy offers a wide variety of tools to help you keep your citizens hard at work!
ASAM Vision: Tapping into the Pipboy's augmented reality features, this will highlight undesirables that aren't registered with the city, such as the homeless or the unemployed. Toggle through the vision modes in the Tools menu OR use our patent-pending ASAM Vision Switch to do so with just a click of a button!
Call Town Meeting: City Manager can help you hold a town meeting by sending out a low frequency pitch through all available ASAM Sensors which will make your citizen's instinctively come to their glorious leader for help!
Display Citizen Needs: Citiy Manager will calculate the approximate needs of your citizens and display them to you as a percentage of fulfillment to help guide you to creating the ultimate tax-generating machine!
Start Self Destruct Sequence: All ASAM Sensors are fitted with exposive devices so you can handle demolitions personally and with the press of a button. The Self Destruct Sequence will tell all of your ASAM Sensors to detonate removing the Plot and any structures built there.
String.Dest:
城市管理软件，结合ASAM传感器技术，和你的Pipboy的超凡能力，提供了各种各样的工具来帮助你保持你的居民努力工作！
ASAM视野：进入Pipboy的增强现实功能，这将高亮显示那些异常对象，如无家可归者或失业者，或者未通电地块。通过在“工具”菜单上的“切换ASAM视野模式“或使用我们的专利的ASAM视野开关来控制，只需点击一个按钮！
举行城镇会议：城市管家可以帮助你发出通知音频给所有可用的ASAM传感器，你的居民的本能地来到他们的光荣领袖面前，并帮助举行市政厅会议！
显示居民需求：城市管家2078将计算你的居民的近似需求，并将它们作为一个百分比显示出来，以便帮助指导你创造你的最终税务城市！
启动自毁程序：所有ASAM传感器都装有爆炸装置，你可以按下一个按钮来亲自强拆。自毁程序将告诉你所有的ASAM传感器引爆并拆除所有地块和其上的建筑。

String.Source: City Manager 2078: A citizen took over an abandoned factory at <Alias=MessagePlotLocation>.
String.Dest: 城市管家2078：一个居民接手了一个废弃的工厂，位于:<Alias=MessagePlotLocation>。

String.Source: City Manager 2078: A citizen just finished some improvements on their factory at <Alias=MessagePlotLocation>.
String.Dest: 城市管家2078：一位居民刚刚完成了一间工厂的升级，位于:<Alias=MessagePlotLocation>

String.Source: City Manager 2078: A citizen started constructing a factory at <Alias=MessagePlotLocation>.
String.Dest: 城市管家2078: 一个居民正在建造一间商店，位于: <Alias=MessagePlotLocation>.

String.Source: You need three pieces of cloth and a piece of leather to refill the machine.
String.Dest: 你需要三块布料和一块皮革来填充机器。

String.Source: City Manager 2078: A citizen just finished building their house at <Alias=MessagePlotLocation>.
String.Dest: 城市管家2078：一个居民完成了房屋的建造，位于:<Alias=MessagePlotLocation>。

String.Source: Refreshing building model and spawned objects.
City Manager 2078: There aren't enough homes to support commercial development yet.
String.Dest: 城市管家2078：没有足够的家庭来支持商业发展。

String.Source: Sim Settlements: Found plots in <Alias=CitizenNeedsLocation>, processing...
String.Dest: Sim Settlements: 在 <Alias=CitizenNeedsLocation> 发现地块, 正在处理...

String.Source: Sim Settlements has completed its updates on this Save. You are good to go!
String.Dest: Sim Settlements已完成游戏存档的更新。可以开始游玩了！

String.Source:
Sim Settlements needs to update its data storage. This could take a few minutes.
Please don't interact with or build any new Plots until you get a pop-up message like this one that this process is complete.
You can continue to play the rest of the game while you wait!
String.Dest:
Sim Settlements 需要更新其数据存储文件。这可能需要几分钟。
请不要与任何Sim Settlements地块互动或建立任何新的地块，直到你收到完成更新的弹出消息。
在等待时你可以继续玩游戏的非 Sim Settlements部分！

String.Source: City Manager 2078: ASAM Sensors location, starting detonation at <Alias=MessagePlotLocation>.
String.Dest: 城市管家2078：ASAM传感器开始自毁，位于<Alias=MessagePlotLocation>。

String.Source: City Manager 2078: ASAM Sensor self-destruct sequence complete. All plots destroyed.
String.Dest: 城市管家2078：ASAM传感器自毁程序完成。所有地块被毁。
